inference: Final Answer: $\boxed{14.7}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: The Angle Bisector Theorem tells us that  \[\frac{AC}{AX}=\frac{BC}{BX}\]so \[AX=\frac{AC\cdot BX}{BC}=\frac{21\cdot30}{45}=\boxed{14}.\]
